quotes:
In office
October 2000 – June 2003

Wang Yingfan
(
Chinese
:
王英凡
; born April 1942) is a Chinese
diplomat
who served as
Permanent Representative
of China to the
United Nations
from 2000 to 2003.

He was also the Chinese Ambassador to the
Philippines
from 1985 to 1990.

Wang was Vice-Chairman of the
National People's Congress Foreign Affairs Committee
from 2003 to 2008.
